attributes.action: Stop the planned widespread closure of A+E departments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has recently announced plans to "centralise" emergency care by closing local hospitals and moving facilities to large "super hospitals".  These plans are based on flawed logic, could kill thousands and seem to be motivated only by a desire to cut costs and privatise the NHS by stealth

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the planned widespread closure of A+E departments."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11268.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/AandEclosures/
